Job Title: Senior Strategic Revenue Analyst

Location: Akron, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
We have many opportunities available on our other career site pages. Click here to link to our careers page!

Signet Jewelers is the world's largest retailer of diamond jewelry, operating more than 2,800 stores worldwide under the iconic brands: Kay Jewelers, Zales, Jared, H.Samuel, Ernest Jones, Peoples, Banter by Piercing Pagoda, Rocksbox, JamesAllen.com and Diamonds Direct. We are a people-first company and this core value is at the heart of everything we do, from empowering our valued team members, to collaborating with our customers, to fostering the communities in which we live and serve. People – and the love their actions inspire – are what drive us. We’re not only proud of the love we inspire outside our walls, we’re especially proud of the diversity, inclusion and equity we’re inspiring inside. There are dynamic career paths awaiting you – rewarding opportunities to impact the lives of others and inspire love. Join us!

JOB SUMMARY:

The Strategic Revenue Analyst will enable Signet to be on the forefront of best-in-class Pricing and Promotion analytics. This role will investigate and provide analyses of competitors, business models, market sizing, and industry trends across multiple Signet Banners. They will conduct market landscape analyses and identify internal and external opportunities. Coordinate with multiple banners, functional teams, and organizational processes to recommend price and promotion/discount changes. Evaluate and quantify tradeoff between protecting margin and maximizing sell through of markdown products.

MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES/ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS:

Develop and automate pricing analysis across the product lifecycle by banner/channel/product category/market. Source and analyze data pertaining to initial market price, promotions/discounts, and clearance. Aggregate findings and provide executive level visualizations to drive incremental sales and margin while maintaining the Banner’s Value Proposition.Utilizing the PriceFx software, design/build/manage analytical models and dashboards to drive value which achieves best in class Pricing & Promotion elasticity and optimal markdown optimization. Stay ahead of pricing trends by leveraging competitor data and commodity data. Ensure Signet is compliant yet optimizing time on sale.Work cross-functionally to ensure pricing strategies incorporate consumer shopping behaviors, customer segmentation, product category strategies and other key business drivers. Advise pricing and promotion opportunities to the Consumer Data & Loyalty teams to drive targeted marketing which maximizes top-line revenues and yields high net profits.Be a change agent and thought leader by promoting, educating and facilitating the concept of profitable revenue growth across Signet.Actively participate in key initiatives as the lead technical resource within the Strategic Revenue Management team to provide subject matter expertise on data and functionality requirements.

POSITION QUALIFICATIONS:

Education Required: Bachelor Degree

Required or Acceptable Job-Related Experience:

Years of Job-Related Experience Required: 5-10 years

Technical/Other Skills Required:

Highly Proficient in Microsoft Office, Tableau, Business Intelligence applications (i.e. SAP BO, Microstrategy, etc.)Highly organized with the ability to manage multiple projects against deadlinesAbility to work with and analyze complex data and summarize findings into actionable processes to achieve goalsPython and/or R experience preferred-SQL and VBA experience preferred

BENEFITS & PERKS:

Competitive healthcare, dental & vision insurance401(k) matching after one year of employmentGenerous time off + company holidaysMerchandise discountLearning & Development programsMuch more!

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
